# Overview

# Packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
```


```{r}
huc15 = st_read("../data/USGS_HUC12/WBD_15/WBDHU12.shp", "WBDHU12")
```
```{r}
huc16 = st_read("../data/USGS_HUC12/WBD_16/WBDHU12.shp", "WBDHU12")
```

```{r}
huc17 = st_read("../data/USGS_HUC12/WBD_17/WBDHU12.shp", "WBDHU12")
```

```{r}
huc18 = st_read("../data/USGS_HUC12/WBD_18/WBDHU12.shp", "WBDHU12")
```

# Bind rows 4222
```{r}
(
  allHucs = bind_rows(huc15, huc16, huc17, huc18) %>% filter(states %in% c("CA", "CA, NV", "CA, OR"))
)
```

# Write 
```{r}
st_write(allHucs, "../outputs/AllHucs.shp", driver="ESRI Shapefile")
```

# Plot

```{r}
plot(st_geometry(allHucs))
```


```{r}
allHucs %>% st_drop_geometry() %>%
  group_by_all() %>%
  filter(n()>1) %>%
  ungroup()
```
